headline: MoneyLion Has An Unusual M&A Deal For You
summary: MoneyLion's acquisition by Gen Digital for $1 billion offers a potential high-reward investment opportunity with strong revenue growth. See more on ML stock here.

headline: Fitch Places Gen Digital Inc.'s IDR on Rating Watch Negative
summary: Fitch Ratings has placed Gen Digital Inc.'s ratings , including its 'BB+' Long-Term Issuer Default Rating , 'BBB-' with a Recovery Rating of 'RR1' senior secured revolver and term loans, and...
